news.title: Microsoft cancels its Perfect Dark and Everwild Xbox games
news.summary: Microsoft is canceling its Perfect Dark and Everwild games as part of sweeping cuts to its Xbox division. Matt Booty, Xbox president of game content and studios, revealed that Microsoft will be closing The Initiative.

news.title: Microsoft’s Forza Motorsport developer hit hard by Xbox cuts
news.summary: More than 70 people will be let go at Forza Motorsport developer Turn 10 Studios. The cuts were made on a call with Microsoft HR representatives this morning.

news.title: Lorde’s new CD is so transparent that stereos can’t even read it
news.summary: Lorde fans are struggling to play the CD version of her new album. Customers who purchased the special edition of Virgin released on a transparent plastic disc are reporting on Reddit and TikTok that many CD players, car stereos, and other sound systems are unable to play it.

news.title: Jurassic World Rebirth needs some more time in the incubator
news.summary: The entire point of Jurassic World Rebirth is to get the franchise back into audiences' good graces. All the same ingredients are there - dinosaurs running amok in a tropical paradise.

news.title: Amazon’s Echo Hub has plunged to a new low price ahead of Prime Day
news.summary: Prime Day kicks off on July 8th. Right now, Prime members can grab an Amazon Echo Hub at Amazon for just $119.99.
